msbt.message: Let's see If this thing were to come at me like THIS, then I gotta dodge like THAT, Alright, I think I'm ready to take this thing on!
Wow! This thing had AMAZING muscles! At least I think it did It's all bones now, .
This thing used to fly around, huh? You could get so buff swinging your arms around like that
Whoa! This thing was definitely, absolutely, maybe, probably stronger than I am.
Carrying giant plates your entire life? Now THAT'S a workout!
Just look at that neck Amazing. The muscles must've been HUGE.
I bet I could lift it if I got a good grip on its tusks, .
A flat shape means flat abs. It's science, !
With that many fins, I bet this fish had some major agility
Looks like it used to be one giant, rugged muscle Just like me!
This dino probably had some life-goal-sized delts! I'm in total awe, !
Why'd they call it a coproLITE when it looks so heavy? Doesn't make any sense,
What's up, little fossil mouse? You're gonna need to bulk up if you want to take me on!
Hey, ! Is it true you donated this? That's really muscular of you!
Whoalooks like it was REALLY buff. I wonder if this is who my mammoth triceps come from,
